physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a soldier sitting on a bed. The soldier is facing to the left of the photograph. He is wearing only his underpants and is holding a couple of rectangular papers in his hands. Cut-outs of people and picture frames of people are pasted on the wall and placed on a drawer respectively.
title_text: Soldier in a room Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
